# discontinuity

**Type Property**

Pass this flag to the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamParseBytes(_:_:_:_:)] function to signal a discontinuity in the audio data.

## Declaration

```swift
static var discontinuity: AudioFileStreamParseFlags { get }
```

## Discussion

Any partial packet straddling a buffer boundary is discarded to avoid having the parser call your callback with a corrupt packet. After a discontinuity occurs, the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamSeek(_:_:_:_:)] function might return approximate values for some data formats.
title: discontinuity
